type1_missing.reasoning: Statistics Bar with Total tasks count, Completed tasks count, and Completion percentage is completely missing from dashboard
Password validation (minimum 6 characters) missing on registration - neither client-side in register page nor server-side in API

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Tasks sorted by creation date oldest first (ASC) instead of newest first (DESC) as specified
Session expiry set to current time instead of 7 days in the future
Task title validation allows max 50 characters but spec requires max 100 characters
Error response format inconsistent - some errors use simple string format {error: 'message'} instead of required {error: {code: 'CODE', message: 'message'}} format

Priority field (low/medium/high) selector and functionality not specified in requirements
Priority display with color coding not specified in requirements
Priority handling in handleAddTask function not specified in requirements
Priority parameter in POST endpoint not specified in API requirements
